DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine relation among food insecurity status , obesity , impulsive food choice pattern test extent mindful eat strategy reduces impulsive choice food . The central hypothesis food-insecure individual demonstrate impulsive food choice pattern demonstrate great likelihood obesity individual food secure . Two specific aim propose : Specific aim # 1 : Determine relation food insecurity , obesity , impulsive food choice pattern woman . The working hypothesis food-insecure individual , especially obese , exhibit impulsive food choice pattern food-secure individual . Specific aim # 2 : Determine efficacy extend mindfulness-based eating strategy impulsive choice pattern among food insecure woman . The work hypothesis mindful eat reduce impulsive food choice pattern relative baseline control condition , persist follow-up . The investigator expect mindful eating reduce impulsive choice compare control condition , despite food security status .
DOC.brief_title: Food Insecurity , Obesity , Impulsive Food Choice
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator recruit woman variety community location , include grocery store , public school , church , local food pantry , governmental food assistance program , Women , Infants , Children Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program . Participants recruit heavily setting low moderate food security prevalent , severe food security . Food insecurity status determine completion 18-item United State Department Agriculture ( USDA ) Food Security Module , score base standardized score technique . Participants provide informed consent , weigh measure , complete several questionnaire measure diet quality , time since last pay check food benefit well information , age , education , ethnicity , employment status , income , marital status , intelligence , nicotine dependence , alcohol drug use . Participants complete baseline delay probability discount task food money measure impulsivity . Then , food insecure woman randomly assign one three arm : mindful eating , nutrition movie , control . Participants mindful eat group give four food receive 50 min mindful eating workshop . Individuals nutrition movie condition also give four food , view 50 minute nutrition video . The third group ( treatment control ) receive four food , treatment . A Time 2 measure discount administer immediately treatment . Then , next week Session 2 , participant mindful eat group ask practice mindful eat throughout week . Research assistant send text message prompt participant remind record practice mindful eating meal twice per day one week . Those Nutrition movie receive number prompt one week period mindful eat group , give give one-word answer question nutrition . Those control group nothing week . After one week mindful eating ( control ) , participant ask return laboratory complete third set discounting task .
DOC.criteria: Must female Must adult Must score 35 ( child ) 37 ( without child ) USDA Food Security Module Must English speaking Pregnancy Diagnosed eat disorder HIV Hemophilia
